message.rftoolsstorage.tablet_scanner.he: Tablet that can be used to reference remote gui's and information
message.rftoolsstorage.tablet_scanner.go: Tablet contains link to storage scanner: right click for scanner gui, sneak right click for tablet gui
message.rftoolsstorage.storage_scanner.h: This machine will scan all nearby inventories and show them in a list. You can then search and access items from those inventories
message.rftoolsstorage.storage_control_m: This screen module allows you to monitor 9 different items through a storage scanner. This module can also be combined with a tablet for remote access to a storage scanner controlled system
Sneak right-click on a storage scanner to set the target for this storage module
message.rftoolsstorage.dump_module.heade: A module for a Screen that allows you to dump a lot of items into a linked Storage Scanner
message.rftoolsstorage.dump_module.gold: Sneak right-click on a storage scanner to set the target for this dump module
message.rftoolsstorage.storage_module.he: This storage module is for the Modular Storage block
message.rftoolsstorage.storage_module.go: This module supports a remote inventory. Link to another storage module in the remote storage block
message.rftoolsstorage.modular_storage.h: This modular storage system can store a lot of items and allows easy searching and filtering. You must first insert a storage module item before you can use it
